content:
ORDER BOOK

You can check the status of the order placed in the Order Book. Go to the Order Book by selecting the Order Book Button in the footer Menu.

1. Executed Orders

All your Executed Order will be displayed under the Executed Tab.

  • View Order Details - You can check executed order details by tapping on a scrip and clicking on the Details Option.

  • Repeat The Order/ Square Off - You can choose to place an order again/square off the order by tapping on the scrip and choosing either the Buy or the Sell option.

2. Pending Orders

Pending/Cancelled/Rejected Orders will be displayed under the Pending Tab.

  • View Order Details (For Pending/Cancelled/Rejected)- Tap on a scrip and select the Details Option to view order details for Pending/ Cancelled/ Rejected Orders.

  • Modify Order (Pending) - Tap on a scrip and click on the Modify Option to modify your Pending Order.

  • Cancel Order (Pending) - Tap on a scrip and click on the Cancel Option to cancel your Pending Order.

  • Repeat the Order (Cancelled/Rejected) - You can choose to place an order again on the Cancelled or Rejected Order by tapping on the scrip and choosing either the Buy or the Sell option.
